website_summaries.verdict: Provides a lovely and affordable tribute to your departed pet. The picture frame could be better, but overall many who have purchased it are happy with it as a memorial to their deceased pets.
pros: Made of sturdy resin, which is likely to hold up well to the elements if used outdoors as a grave marker
Features a paw shape and remembrance poem, and has a built-in picture frame so you can personalize it with your pet's photo
cons: The downside of the picture frame is that it's small, and may not protect a photo from the elements
Some customers wish the memorial itself were a bit larger

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful memorial
customer_reviews.text: Our dog passed away unexpectedly and we buried her in our backyard.. We wanted to set something in that spot to make it a little extra special and not just resemble the rest of the yard.. we looked around but loved this one since we could put a photo of our pup in it.. So far it's held up perfectly throughout all of the rainstorms we've had in these last couple weeks. It's beautiful and sturdy. Would definitely recommend for those of you who've lost your fur babies as well..
customer_reviews.author: LoveCheeta

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful keepsake
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't been quite 2 weeks since we lost one of our furangels and it is still raw. This stone is a wonderful way of memorializing our baby and I love that a photo can be put in there. I will put it in the back yard, where for years, he enjoyed playing and lounging. Thank you for making this keepsake, so our broken hearts can begin healing and we'll have this to remember him by, any time we're outside playing with whichever new foster pup comes through our home.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Not a purchase anyone hopes to make, but if you're looking for a memorial stone for your beloved pet, this is it!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this memorial stone is A+ ! Looks very nice, just like a real stone! I wasn't expecting much as far as quality goes,( for the price) but it certainly exceeds my expectations. It has more weight to it than I expected. I don't have to worry about it being carried off by my neighbor's dog who loves to carry off anything he can get his mouth on! It was delivered in a couple of days. You cant go wrong with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Shook

customer_reviews.title: Beloved Pet
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on my beloved pet's grave. Nothing negative to say of product. It was just what i needed and item was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Branson

customer_reviews.title: Our family was delighted to see that the description of this merchandise is ...
customer_reviews.text: Our family was delighted to see that the description of this merchandise is accurate. Well constructed and durable. The picture compartment can double as a "shadow box." We inserted a piece of Bella's collar with the tags attached and put it inside (see picture). We taped the bottom opening with a strong clear packaging tape to ensure moisture and little critters cannot go inside. We love this memorial stone.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Chrissy, I want you to know that your Paw Prints Memorial stone is just beautiful. We lost our precious cat, Mr. It, just last week, and we feel like a part of our life is missing. He is buried in our back yard right next to his bud, Precious, who we lost 2 years ago, both were 15 when they passed 2 years apart. We have a picture of them together on the stone; God Bless you!
customer_reviews.author: MARCIA

customer_reviews.title: I Cried!
customer_reviews.text: This Memorial Stone is beautiful. Good heavy weight. My Cat, Chewy, who 16 years ago I found abandoned and just a week or so old, passed away this past week. I ordered this stone and it was at my door in two days. I am a mess now after see the stone and placing Chewy's photo in the slot. You have to laminate your photo but Photo laminate can be found in the check out lane at Walmart or in their photo department for a few dollars. You will not be disappointed if you order this. It is worth much more than the price they are selling it for. RIP Chewy :(
customer_reviews.author: Carrie C. Mustin

customer_reviews.title: Great Memorial For a Great Dog That He Was !!
customer_reviews.text: Our Dog Name was Kidd, may he rest in peace, this memorial is so Great and it is waterproof also. So there is a Picture of Kidd, also have a locket of his hair in it, also glued a brass plate on it with the Best Years He Lived Here On Earth. DOG = Man & Women's Best Friend & All Dog's go to Heaven, & Why are they our Best Friend, That is Because DOG Spelled Backward's is Our Best Friend Also !!! This Paw Print is Great & Very Well Made. Thanks for Not being junk.
customer_reviews.author: Alien of Northern MI.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: After 15 year great years, I recently lost my pup unexpectedly and ...
customer_reviews.text: After 15 year great years, I recently lost my pup unexpectedly and suddenly. While devastated, I wanted to find something to pay tribute to her and the Paw Print Memorial Stone was exactly what I was looking for. I received it a few days after ordering it. Due to its sturdiness and durability, I'll be able to put it in her favorite resting spot in my yard all year round without worrying that a north east winter will damage it. My pet deserved nothing but the best and she just got the best memorial tribute.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: In loving memory of Chloe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product due to for the first time I had experienced in putting my dog down. Chloe was 14 years old and had a mass cell tumor that was spreading throughout her body. She was also experiencing neuropathy, losing weight very fast, was deaf, nearly 100% blind and my husband and I had decided to give her rest from all the ailments she was going through. The saying that is written on the Memorial Stone was perfect as it describes her to the max. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous3

customer_reviews.title: This memorial stone was perfect for our beloved cat BooBoo
customer_reviews.text: This memorial stone was perfect for our beloved cat BooBoo, who passed at the fine old age of 17 years. Everyone that sees it in our garden, always asks where we got it. It is a gift that keeps on giving (to my daughter for her first pet and myself), and can be moved to a new garden if need be. You can also make a little box for ashes, like we did, placed under the picture. Thank you Paw Prints.
customer_reviews.author: Gbrask

customer_reviews.title: Can't rely on this to keep any photos safe or protected.
customer_reviews.text: I don't see how this would be good for much of anything if you at all value the picture. It's a small window. It's a cheap plastic that loosely fits and nothing to secure anything from falling out of the bottom. Picture and plastic falls out and mine is inside. Outside would surely ruin any photo you would try to use. Obviously an economic product but protecting the photo should be a fundamental feature.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, picture slot very small.
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful gift for my husband who just lost his beloved "Bubba". My only disappointment was that the picture holder was so small 3×2 & it isn't a very protective slot if you'd like to put it outside. You would need (as suggested) to definitely laminate the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Abercrombie Howard

customer_reviews.title: Real good quality....
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised of the quality of this piece. The ONLY problem I had is that the piece of clear plastic that comes with it that you put over the picture slides out the bottom because it is just too short to stay in over your picture. In addition I found that Walgreens does wallet size photos which are 2x3 so I got that and it fit perfectly. I attached a picture of how it looks. I pet sit this baby for 4 years and she just passed over the weekend, this is for her family.
customer_reviews.author: InADaze

customer_reviews.title: Pricey for materials, one hollow/one solid, but beautiful for the purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Saw this and had to have it for our two dogs that passed 8 months apart. I love them. The only thing a bit pricey for the quality, and the first one I opened was solid. The second one I opened was hollow. So I know it will not last long at all outside. This was very disappointing. One was so much heavier than the other. Otherwise, I love them. Just what I was looking for. I could send back, but too much trouble. They have a home here now. If the second was solid , I would give a four. If price was better for outdoor use I would give a five.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha W.

customer_reviews.title: Wholeheartedly recommend for those who were left with a big piece of their heart missing in their home
customer_reviews.text: Much heavier and thicker than I imagined. I do agree that any picture put in the piece be laminated. I thought about putting it outside but my family wanted to gaze upon it everyday in the house. It sits prominently in our living room and reminds of us our wonderful friend and buddy, Kodi. I do think that if it were outside that there would not be a problem with 'weathering.' Well made and a passionate reminder of the love of our Best Friend and how he left us behind to meet him later at the Rainbow Bridge.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for pet lovers
customer_reviews.text: My sister lost two of her beloved dogs within a short span of time. I wanted to get her something that she can put a photo of them in. This item is perfect and so so heavy duty. The first one came damaged, but they replaced it so fast and I am sure it is not the seller's fault. Really would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs are like our children but unfortunately we outlive them and face ...
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs are like our children but unfortunately we outlive them and face the inevitable day when we must say goodbye. The wonderfully innovative product has helped us keep them in our hearts and minds. We have five of this paw prints with out babies pictures in a memorial garden near our lake and a park bench where we often sit and read with our lost loved ones. Great product, that seemingly lasts forever. We love you guys for these Paw Print Memorial Stones as they provide us great comfort and peace and keep our memories of these incredible friends and loved ones, our dogs that have moved on! Thank you from the bottom of our hearts!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just one of three memorial stones I purchased for my lovable departed pets. I purchased another one of these beautiful stones for my departed lovable lab, Raven. The saying fits her to a T. I miss her but now when I go to her resting site, I can see her pic, read the heart-felt saying and know that she is waiting for me at the Rainbow Bridge. I will purchase another one of your stones for my other departed lovable lab, Dakotah, in September. Thank you for a wonderful product that truly expresses the love one has for their pet.
customer_reviews.author: Michal Cottrill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. We bought this for losing our best friend and companion to a undiagnosed pancreatic tumor. Our hearts were broken and there was a mix up at the vet on getting his ashes back so we sadly did not get his ashes. Having something so sincere in his memory means a lot to us and we keep it in the house. We still have yet to put a picture in it. But the product is great. The only flaw in the product is that all the wording is coded in black so you can really read it and the word love was the only word on my product that was left without the coding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth More Then We Paid. We Love It.
customer_reviews.text: We lost our 15 yr old Papillon to Kidney Failure July 2018. It was a fast passing at our Vet. We were able to hold her while she got The End Of Her Life Shot. This Memorial Is More Then We All Expected. It’s Heavy and Beautiful. Arrived Fast and in Perfect Condition.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie V. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Future gift
customer_reviews.text: I think this will be the perfect memorial for our daughters' dog. We've added a picture to the paw from their dogs' younger years. Our daughter and her husband have had their dog for 17 years but he is starting to fail so we want to be prepared for the worst.
customer_reviews.author: RCL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! It's perfect! I love it! I can't believe how fast it got here! I got it for my dad who lost his best buddy in August. I wanted him to be able to see it from the porch out by the tree where the grave is and it's perfect! I love how we will be able to put his picture in it. My dad may just want to keep it in the house and we'll have to get another type of grave marker. It's just that nice. Thank you so much! I highly recommend buying products from this business!
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for someone who lost their pet
customer_reviews.text: My good friend lost her beloved dog that has been with her for almost 19 years. He was a very unique dog who had many lives. I wanted to give her something that she cut put out by her garden as a reminder. The only issue I had was trying to find a picture that would fit the small opening. I finally ordered a 2x3 picture from Costco and had to cut it down more to fit the opening. She loves it so I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: rcunni2

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. On top where the writing is paper thin. My wife had set this in the garden next to our beloved and went to slide it and it broke. First 30 seconds outside.... I was so upset I threw it in the trash. Don't be heartbroken like I was. Buy a nice steel or granite memorial. Should be no stars.
customer_reviews.author: Yooper

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty accurate to what was received
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty accurate to what was received. For going on and on about how it will withstand the weather, the photo slots top plastic moves all around and wont even cover the picture. That part is kind of a disappointment. Over all, nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice Memorial Marker
customer_reviews.text: Our Dog passed in October and we made him a memorial area where he was buried. We wanted something we could add a picture of him with. This is perfect. I laminated a picture and put it in with the plastic cover over the picture and it has held up for 3 months in Michigan Weather! So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Dickson

customer_reviews.title: It’s use for outdoor and the words written on the gift.
customer_reviews.text: Paw Print Pet Memorial Stone hit right at the heart for my sister a Lynda. After loosing her dog of 22yrs Spike a Chihuahua. It couldn’t have been a better way to remember a very beloved pet. I’d recommend this product to anyone dealing with a recent departed from the family.Thank you for creating a thought gift to o help my sister in a difficult time.Its nice and beautiful with durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All damaged
customer_reviews.text: Order'd 6 of these because they were SUPPOSED TO BE squirrel resistant. Well THEY'RE NOT!!!! All 6 are broken with the bottoms torn off (by the squirrels no less). NEEDLESS TO SAY THIS WAS A TON OF BIRDSEED LOST.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Mast

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a neighbor who lost their fur baby😭 It was good quality the only thing I wish was that the place where the picture goes is a little too small and it's difficult to get the picture to stay without falling out the bottom I had to add a piece of tape and cut a small piece of cardboard to make it a little thicker to hold it in place
customer_reviews.author: David Monroy

customer_reviews.title: Photo protection is not great!
customer_reviews.text: Item is nice looking but could be brittle if dropped due to it being hollow. The picture insert doesn't hold picture in place and has no protection for it. instructions say to laminate your photo before placing picture in the photo spot.
customer_reviews.author: mobud36

customer_reviews.title: Paw Print Pet Memorial Review
customer_reviews.text: The Paw Print arrived very quickly and was everything they said. I had a 2"x3" picture made and it fits into the slot easily, but even when laminated, I thought it too loose. I think there should be some kind a a retainer to hold the picture in more firmly, but other than that, I am well pleased. You can pack in some thick card stock to make the picture set in more tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Bearcat

customer_reviews.title: Paw Print Memorial Stone
customer_reviews.text: My little Lili died unexpectedly and quick and we wanted something to put by her grave the words on the memorial stone was perfect. The company followed through every step making sure the item was received and that we had no issues with the item. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: EJP

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We recently lost our 14-year old Miniature Schnauzer "Jasper" who meant the world to us. I purchased this stone for my wife's work desk and she absolutely loved it when I gave it to her. It's quality made, has a very meaningful message on it and the picture slot will keep his memory alive moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: Marc DiGirolamo

customer_reviews.title: Paw Print Pet Memorial Stone
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute idea to give to my mom who had to put her dog to sleep. It is somewhat heavy and as described. The only part I did not like is there was no way to keep the picture waterproof. I had to wrap some plastic around it, but she ended up keeping it inside.
customer_reviews.author: Unttextbooks

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these maybe about one week difference. They came packaged perfectly and they’re beautiful. Thank you for creating something so meaningful for our dogs that are now in heaven.
customer_reviews.author: ketita

customer_reviews.title: I personally love this stone
customer_reviews.text: I personally love this stone. I have bought others from other sellers, but this one is a bit smaller which I like. The slightly smaller version looks better. I had bought several as gifts as several of my friends have lost their pet. It helped to make a devastating time a tiny bit bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen L

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Just what expected. Very nice. Lamented a picture and for perfect. Knew it would be light since not made of solid stone...only reason rated 4 in this area. Great for price.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful memorial stone for loved and lost pets
customer_reviews.text: Recieved my poor dogs memorial stone recently, its a very sweet saying and live that it holds his picture. Will be placing it at his forever home in our back yard. I hope it can with stand the cold winter months. Item came in exact time as stated, which was great as we just lost our poor Chihuahua doggy of 10 years days before. This is fitting to how we feel about him.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: my family was very sad especially my son
customer_reviews.text: We lost our pet of 15 yrs, my family was very sad especially my son. I ordered the stone it came quickly. We now have her picture and a memory of her in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Betzy L.

customer_reviews.title: Cute way to remember your fur baby
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and love that there is a slot for your picture. It's a pretty big size stone... does feel plasticky. But still cute.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Great way to remember a pet
customer_reviews.text: I love our paw print! It was actually picked out by my 9 year old son. It arrived 2 days later in perfect condition and it gave us a chance to talk some more about our Duckie. As we picked out the perfect picture we laughed and reminisced. When the time comes again, we have several pets, this will be part of our grieving process.
customer_reviews.author: Traci W

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful looking and thoughtful wording but after a few months ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looking and thoughtful wording but after a few months the writing started to fade out and the plastic became brittle. As a result I was holding it to tightly while cleaning it and my thumb pressed through the top paw portion. I was able to repair it and repaint the writing. It would be great it it was better made for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: michael b.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Much heavier than I expected, which is good because we have two one hundred pound dogs running around the yard. We wanted to make sure Mia had a spot in her yard and this worked perfectly. I put her picture in it today and placed it exactly where she would sit and bark at squirrels. Nicely made. Thank you for getting this to us so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard & Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Memorial Stone for my baby Tara 🐶
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful... It added it perfect touch to her burial site although I removes it often because I don't want her picture to her Rained on.. it does come with a plastic shield for protection of picture & I enforced with whole plastic.. really probably move it because she was the perfect dog an I love to watch her on my porch beside me.. it's perfect!! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: My Oliver of 12 passed away last week and we buried him in our backyard and I wanted something to put on the grave and this worked out great. I sitll need to get a small picture to put in it but I couldn't wait and went ahead and put it on his grave. I love the way it looks and the saying on it. I will defiently buy again if I need to but hope not soon.I was very pleased with the shipping and the personal touch of the seller
customer_reviews.author: Sandy L  Stotts

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical of ordering this at first. Our dog of 13 years passed away recently so I was shopping for something special to give to my parents. I came across this to put in the breezeway, where she would often hang out at. The first picture I tried to put in there didn’t really go in. I struggled at first but it wouldn’t stay in there so I had to tape it. It also doesn’t stand up very well so we just lend it up against the wall. Overall it’s cute and I like the picture my mom found for it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica M. Cieri

customer_reviews.title: We love it! Perfect for our boy Bruno who passed ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Perfect for our boy Bruno who passed away on friday. Its been some rough days and this has helped cope with his loss. We set it outside with the memorial tree we got him. Its more than perfect! The quality of the product is great. I thought it was going to be more plastic, smaller, and light but its pretty heavy. Its a great size and just beautiful. I really recommend it for anyone who has lost a beloved fur family.
customer_reviews.author: Atziri Masters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all your fur babies remembering.
customer_reviews.text: I love this pet stone. I lost my Malachi and bought one for him and then decided to get another to match for his sister, Anabell to have when she passes. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: A special way to remember a beloved pet!
customer_reviews.text: This was for our grand dog! It will help the grandchildren remember their 14 year old beloved Lab! I haven’t given the stone to them yet! But I know they will be happy to have it with a picture of their dog in it!
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Quick Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Thanks so much for the quick delivery, it touched our hearts. Thanks for the emails of concern about the delivery, that meant alot. I would order this again if needed, hopefully it won't be needed soon. We have a few fur babies and I appreciate the thoughtfulness that you have shown.
customer_reviews.author: mt063042

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful way to memorialize a beloved pet!
customer_reviews.text: Love my memorial stone for my recently deceased beloved Rocky. I had him cremated and a ceramic footprint made, but also wanted simethjng to put in the flower bed as I walk out the door each day and this was perfect. The picture fits perfectly and the inscription is beautifully moving. Thank you for making such a lovely product.
customer_reviews.author: lousgirl

customer_reviews.title: Memories last forever
customer_reviews.text: We just lost our shihtzu, and we wanted to keep a memorial of him, and this item was perfect for us. The stone is good size but you will have to make the picture very small
customer_reviews.author: Peluche

customer_reviews.title: needs laminated picture
customer_reviews.text: Good except it makes it seem like you can put any picture in there but you have to get a picture laminated. This is misleading. Should come with a protective cover for picture so you dont need to get the picture laminated.
customer_reviews.author: Briana B.

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely beautiful! The only problem is the photo falling out ...
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely beautiful! The only problem is the photo falling out of the bottom, it should be sideways. Had to put tape on the bottom to keep it in. Everytime you pick it up the pic falla out. Had that same problem 10 years ago when we lost our first dog, but it is beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful memorial plaque!
customer_reviews.text: It's so beautiful. What a beautiful way to memorialize our beloved and faithful pet of 14 yrs. Because of the way the picture fits you have to stick something under there to hold it in, but other than that i propped it on something for display in our livingroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have seen a lot but none that match the sentiment like this stone
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Paw Print Memorial Stone. I have seen a lot but none that match the sentiment like this stone. This stone truly is the one worthy of my precious baby that gave unconditional love for 13 years. I recommend this stone for anyone wanting to keep their baby in their heart.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Received it on time. Looks great, will be setting it up as soon as I can the picture laminated. The picture size that fits is 2x3 Just concerned about how it appears there is no cover underneath the stone where photo is inserted if I wanted to place the stone outside. .
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: It’s absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beautiful memorial stone I have ever seen. It’s very touching and beautiful!! ❤️❤️❤️ We haven’t added the photo yet because this is a gift I’m giving to a good friend who just lost her “ only 2 years old puppy “ But again it’s beautiful
customer_reviews.author: lindamc

customer_reviews.title: SandyP
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when it came, unfortunately, my 3 year old grandson stepped on it thinking it was a stepping stone, and it's broken. Has a big hole in it, and the entire area that had the writing is gone.
customer_reviews.author: SandyP

customer_reviews.title: NOT weatherproof, cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Was cheap plastic, and if putting a pic in it, it definitely ISN'T weatherproof.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Palmer

customer_reviews.title: gift for a neighbors loss
customer_reviews.text: purchased for neighbors who lost their dog. they were extremely overwhelmed with a beautiful well made memorial for their pet. really really nice
customer_reviews.author: dims

customer_reviews.title: 🐾 🐈 🐕
customer_reviews.text: This small yet beautiful stone really commemorates a loved family member who has passed. Our beautiful pets deserve to be honored
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this memorial stone
customer_reviews.text: This memorial stone was even better in quality & size than I had imagined. I put my precious (19 year old) Boo's picture in the slot, & I pick bouquets of flowers to set next to it daily @ the head of his grave. I can see the stone & flowers from my bathroom window. Highly recommended! Can't imagine anyone not being satisfied with this memorial stone.
customer_reviews.author: hummingbird

customer_reviews.title: Frankie Blue
customer_reviews.text: So I lost my husky brother Monday morning. He just turned 14. My mom was devastated. I knew we had to get a memorial marker. I saw this and loved it. My mom got it and fell in love with it. Thank you so much for this. I wish I did not have to write this post.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with the Paw Print Memorial Stone
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the Paw Print Memorial Stone. Very nice way to memorialize a beloved pet. The only downside is that the spot to place a picture is extremely small for a picture. I instead wrote my pet’s name and placed it in the picture insert.
customer_reviews.author: susieq

customer_reviews.title: Precious Memories
customer_reviews.text: We appreciate how quickly we received our memorial stone. We haven’t even been able to choose which photo we want to use. We have 12 years of photos to choose from. I’m a Veterinary Technician and will defiantly refer your company to our clients. It’s such a beautiful and enexpensive option for people to remember such a beloved family member.
customer_reviews.author: HL

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: The paw print was bigger than I expected which was very nice. I am going to laminate his picture before I put it in the frame to save it from the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend whose dog passed away and he absolutely loved it. Perfect gift for someone who lost a pet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice to honor loved one
customer_reviews.text: Goid size and appearance. Marker as resting place for our beloved pet and family member.
customer_reviews.author: texasnana

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice touch for our faithful friend. It was nice to reminisce while looking for just the right photo.
customer_reviews.author: eipwoc

customer_reviews.title: the your order is going to be like they offer in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: beautiful stone love it my pet kuki just past away on August 3 i am very happy with my purchase thank you
customer_reviews.author: cristina

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just received our for our little TJ. We love that it has a picture slot so we can always see his sweet little face❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not flat on bottom. Will not stand upright.
customer_reviews.text: Not flat on bottom. Will not stand upright. I had to sand bottom flat so it would stand up. No hole in back to hang on wall.
customer_reviews.author: Rene'e

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sympathy gift for a friend
customer_reviews.text: This was the second paw print memorial stone I have purchased. I bought one for a friend last year and was very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Marion B. Dodd

customer_reviews.title: For someone you love
customer_reviews.text: It made my son-in-law very happy. He just lost his friend. Very Nice
customer_reviews.author: Fadeaway

customer_reviews.title: Raja
customer_reviews.text: Using this in my garden for my beloved cat that passed away almost a year ago. He loved hanging out with me here. I laminated the picture and used the plastic film it came with to cover it. I'm hoping it lasts as good as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Helps to cope with a deep loss, and show that they will never be forgot.
customer_reviews.text: This Memorial is the perfect size, not too big as to be distracting, not so small that it is overlooked, the quality is great, and it was shipped in a protective package, of course we would have preferred to never had the need for this product, but it has helped us to accept the loss of a close family member.
customer_reviews.author: robert l walls

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Memorial Picture Frame
customer_reviews.text: This photo frame a Christmas gift for a friend who lost her dog right before the holidays. It put a smile on her face once she opened it. What a nice memorial for Jackson.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Lammons

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My parents will love the memorial stone for Max their beloved pet who is no longer here. I can't wait to put his picture in it and give it to them. It didn't take long to arrive either. Thank you for the great service during a difficult time!
customer_reviews.author: blessed one

customer_reviews.title: I recommended you to 5 other people!
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful! It was a gift to a very special person who lost his fur baby and was just devastated! This brings hiom much comfort! I would buy from you again AND I have recommended your site to 5 other people!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for the shrine I have arranged around my baby ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the shrine I have arranged around my baby girls ashes. All the things I have ordered from amazon are in a corner on a table where she lay and sleep on here bed. Thank You so much for the email.
customer_reviews.author: jashirley

customer_reviews.title: beautiful for anumal lovers
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my brothers dog that died from cancer, the picture part does not seal but if you buy a $1.00 page of lamination paper then it works great. I poured some concrete and set it in to keep it in place. I love this and will buy for the rest of the dogs when they pass.
customer_reviews.author: steve blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Pet memorial
customer_reviews.text: I just lost my pet , and this is just made so well and I could put it anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Hope A.

customer_reviews.title: Most beautiful thing I ever ordered
customer_reviews.text: The most beautiful thing I ever bought we lost our dog on Wednesday 😭 we miss him dearly 💔 Thank you so much for this wonderful seller
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: This is beautiful for my Dog, Bear's memorial.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy to say I am well pleased with this memorial for my Dog. I plan on adding a solar light of angel wings holding a Dog. They bring us such joy I wanted to honor him in his death. Thank you, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Diane F.

customer_reviews.title: WE received the beautiful and inexpensive memorial for our pet of 16 years ...
customer_reviews.text: WE received the beautiful and inexpensive memorial for our pet of 16 years and are very happy with it. The Paw Print Memorial inspired us to plant a small tree in our backyard and place the memorial in an appropriately beautiful place adjacent to it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a friend that lost her dog. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: AAA
customer_reviews.text: This is a top of the line product at a very good price. The quality really hit home and I'm proud to use on my pets grave site.
customer_reviews.author: John Glaser

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for remember ones furry family member!! I laminated the photo before putting it in the slot and it has held up beautifully through All the rain, heat and it’s been raining quite a bit lately but it looks just as good as it did when I put it outside 2 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Not cheaply made. This is sturdy and we have it placed on our Gooch’s burial spot. Nice way to remember him.
customer_reviews.author: Frygirl629

customer_reviews.title: Photo is very small and you have to laminate your ...
customer_reviews.text: Photo is very small and you have to laminate your photo if you want to leave it outside. However, works for me. The stone is cute and i was able to insert a photo of my dog that recently passed.
customer_reviews.author: Judinski

customer_reviews.title: Paw Print Stone
customer_reviews.text: This makes my fur boy's departure final. RIP my boy.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Quinones

customer_reviews.title: A great tribute to a loved pet
customer_reviews.text: This will be used as a memorial stone for Smoke, a recently deceased pet. It will be used outdoors on his burial spot.
customer_reviews.author: DSR

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful way to remember your pet by. Just wish it was made with a more durable material since it is made for the outdoors. Broke after about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A QUALITY PRODUCT A+++++++
customer_reviews.text: The paw print memorial stone is a quality product - the price was right- The quality was there to see. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: FAAQ2

customer_reviews.title: Great gift .. fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my neighbor who recently lost her dog. It arrived in one business day and she loved it so much! This makes a great gift !
customer_reviews.author: Gina B Monat

customer_reviews.title: What do you say to someone who lost their beloved pet?
customer_reviews.text: There are no words that will bring comfort to someone or family that has lost their beloved pet. Their home feels empty. The Paw Print Memorial Stone is a lovely way to offer them comfort during this difficult time and to remember their pet who was a large part of the family.
customer_reviews.author: Susan O.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute but I didn't want to lay it flat, I wanted to display it. The picture just falls out of the bottom. There isn't anyway to keep it inside unless you lay it flat.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S.

customer_reviews.title: Worthy
customer_reviews.text: If you laminate a picture it won't get wet. Larger than I thought. Very good gift for someone who lost their dog.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

product_meta.title: Paw Print Pet Memorial Stone - Features Sympathy Poem - Indoor Outdoor Dog or Cat for Garden Backyard Marker Grave Tombstone - Loss of Pet Gift - Loss of Dog Gift
product_meta.description:
Pattern Name:PawPrint StoneTHIS PAW PRINT PET MEMORIAL KEEPSAKE GRAVE STONE OR GARDEN STONE is beautifully designed and stamped with a touching poem and has an frame opening to display a personalized 2" x 3" picture. 

The copyrighted stamped poem says: "Missing your unconditional love and playful paws, we are now apart. Gone from our lives, but never from our heart" 

THE MEMORIAL STONE IS MADE OF DURABLE RESIN: This stone made to look and feel like real stone and it is designed to withstand the outdoor elements. 

Save Money When You Buy Multiples! Save $2 When You Buy 2, Save $5 When You Buy 3, Save $8 When You Buy 4. Enter code O9O2URZF at checkout.
feature_bullets: A THOUGHTFUL PET LOSS SYMPATHY GIFT- Help a grieving friend or loved one remember their special pet with this beautiful pet memorial stone in the shape of a paw print. The stone is etched with a poem and a 2" x 3" photo frame that lets you customize the memorial for that special companion who has crossed the rainbow bridge.

HONOR THE LOSS OF A FURRY FAMILY MEMBER - This special keepsake will keep your pets memory alive and honor his/her memory with this touching poem on this beautifully crafted memorial stone. KEEP YOUR PET'S MEMORY ALIVE- Having this memorial stone nearby will provide comfort and rekindle fond memories and emotions of the good times you shared with your loyal, loving friend.

PERFECT FOR BOTH INDOORS AND OUTDOORS- This stone will look just as good in your garden as it would on your fireplace mantle, shelf, or table (the stone can stand up on its base for display).- There is a convenient slot at the base of the stone where a picture may be inserted. For best results against the outdoor elements, it is recommended to laminate the photo. (Note: The stone will not come with a picture)
MADE OF WEATHERPROOF RESIN and has the look and feel of a real stone. This stone is designed to withstand the outdoor elements. Measurements are: 8.25" High: 8.5" Wide and 1.5" Thick.

GET IT WITH CONFIDENCE: Being so sure about the great quality and unique design of these unique pet memorial stones, Pawprints Remembered offers you a 30-Day Money Back Satisfaction guarantee and their best replacement policy in the improbable case that this pet memorial doesn't meet your expectations. With nothing to worry about, order yours today! SAVE MONEY WHEN YOU BUY MULTIPLES!-- Save $2 When You Buy 2, Save $5 When You Buy 3, Save $8 When You Buy 4. Enter code O9O2URZF at checkout.
